text: Hydra is the second studio album by American rock band Toto and was released in October 1979 through Columbia Records. It went to number 1 in Norway, number 10 in Canada, number 15 in Sweden, number 29 in New Zealand, number 37 in Japan and the United States, number 38 in Germany and number 41 in Australia. == Track listing == == References == Category:1979 albums Category:Toto (band) albums
title: Hydra (Toto album)
